This page on SteamDB lists all games tagged as 'First-Person Shooter' (FPS) on Steam. The FPS tag is used to identify games where the player experiences the action from a first-person perspective, immersing them in the game world. Players often engage in combat using firearms or other projectile weapons, and may also employ stealth or tactical strategies to outmaneuver opponents. The FPS genre includes a wide range of sub-genres, such as military shooters, science fiction shooters, survival horror, and more. This page updates automatically to provide the most current information about FPS games on Steam.
